articles.title: Detroit Lions Week 9 stock report: Stafford has bottomed out, Griffen falls flat - prideofdetroit.com
articles.description: Stafford has bottomed out, and Griffen’s hype has failed to materialize.
articles.content:
Sometimes you do all the research on a stock that you can. You think you know it well, youve got the pulse on what is going on, and you make your move.
